title: 'Worth For Money'
body: 'Was skeptical buying online without first trying it out. But went for it anyway. It was worth the risk. The Sofa is comfortable and sturdy. No scratches or defects. The packaging ensured the item remained intact. The delivery team was polite and lifted it till Second floor and delivered it where we asked to. Overall a good experience.'

title: 'Height could have been better to suit the usage for old.'
body: I would recommend this if you are in a house which you will be shifting very often. Its lightweight and easily shifted. Very easy to switch between sofa to bed and vice-versa. No need to be so strong enough to move the product given its light weight. Easily movable around even by a kid. Height could have been a little bit more as it is slightly difficult for the old to sit and use it. Bed can easily be used by 2 people and a kid and can comfortably be a seat for 4 adults. But definitely you won't be needing a sofa bigger than this given it's multi purpose usability.

title: 'Not Recommended for Sit Back and Relax'
body: I am using this sofa for now 3 months and here is my review. If you want sofa to rest back, then this is not the one, there is a problem in height and cushion won't work.. It is good for temporary basis like if someone visits your place, then they can sit...But when the time would come for relaxation, it would give you pain... Though the bed i found is good which is again good for bachelors..Not for families... Price vs Product is on higher end..Yes, the question would arise that in comparison to other sofas it is very less..But believe me the material that the company used is not worth.. All the best..

title: 'Best product.'
body: It's so nice a product from amazon, amazing service and packaging was also great. Best product so far in compared to other websites. 4 people can easily sit and two people can easily lie comfortably. Go ahead without second thoughts. A genuine product indeed from the provider as well. Highly recommended.

title: 'Does the job'
body: 'I have read reviews for sofa cum bed from wakefit as well. There were some bad reviews. But the product was costlier than this. So i decided to give this a try. Its not bad with the price tag it comes with. Stuff is good.. Not very spongy but it does the job. Bed can easily be used by 2 people but sitting is just for 3 folks. But you dont want sofa bigger than this. I would recommend this if you are in a house which you will be shifting very often. Its lightweight and easily shifted.'

body: 'Bought this Fresh Up sofa cum bed recently. It has been a great addition to my small space. Great quality comfortable easy to fold and unfold the color is super amazing too. And it comes with 3 cushions! Definitely worth buying. Really happy with the product'
